name: personal-knowledge-management
description: Claude Code plugins for personal knowledge management — PARA notes and GTD with OmniFocus

plugins.name: para-notes
plugins.description: PARA note management for Obsidian vaults — capture, organize, review, and retrieve notes using the PARA method

plugins.name: gtd-omnifocus
plugins.description: GTD task management for OmniFocus — capture, process inbox, plan projects, and weekly reviews via AppleScript
